import React from 'react' import literals from './literals' import { Route, withRouter, Redirect, Switch, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './index.sass' import emoji from 'react-easy-emoji' function ResultsFav({ lang, items, stop, error, onFav, favs }) { const { back, to } = literals[lang] return

{stop} - {items[0].stop_name}

    { items.map(({ line, t_in_min, color_line, dest_line, name_line, desc_line }) => { let style = { color: `#${color_line}`, }; return

  • { emoji(' üìç') }{name_line} - {desc_line} {to} {dest_line}

    {t_in_min} min{ emoji(' üöåüí®üí®') }

    • }) }
{error}
} export default ResultsFav
